mapper.select: SELECT C.`id`,C.`title`,C.`cover`,C.`lesson_num` AS lessonNum,C.`price`, S.`title` AS subjectLevelOne,S2.`title` AS subjectLevelTwo, T.`name` AS teacherName FROM edu_course C LEFT JOIN edu_course_description D ON C.`id`= D.`id` LEFT JOIN edu_teacher T ON C.`teacher_id`=T.`id` LEFT JOIN edu_subject S ON C.`subject_parent_id`=S.`id` LEFT JOIN edu_subject S2 ON C.`subject_id`=S2.`id` WHERE C.`id`=#{id}
